website_summaries.verdict: An affordable dishwasher that has similar features to full-size models and a budget-friendly price.
pros: Manufactured by a popular brand in the industry
In addition to room for 6 place settings, offers a drying function
cons: Some wash cycles are lengthy, and it uses a lot of water

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it!!!! I wish I would of bought it years ago. I rinse off and put in dishwasher. No longer do I stand at sink and bare terrible back pain as I was the dishes. When full just hit the button. It's very quiet and if you pack it as it shows you can get a lot into it. I love that it's on the counter. I don't have to bend to fill or empty it. Great for a small household. I still wash a few things, like plastic containers and pots & pans. I prefer to wash those by hand as it's only 1 or 2 pieces a day. It's well made and easy to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: I am overall happy with my purchase. I use it quite often. The dishes are clean after the cycle (I am bad about not rinsing before putting it in.) Useualy not a spot on them dishes. For the money and for what it is designed for. It is well worth purchasing one.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Best investment
customer_reviews.text: Came in yesterday, I got a roommate who just doesn't do dishes now instead of a full sink I got a nice clean one that also have clean plates cups and utensils
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: The Magic Chef is built better, doesn't leak as much water from the hose ...
customer_reviews.text: I had one of the cheapos from a different brand on here. The Magic Chef is built better, doesn't leak as much water from the hose when it's done, takes up less space and seems to clean better. It's worth the few extra dollars it costs.
customer_reviews.author: Stinkfoot

customer_reviews.title: Not quite as effective as I had hoped, but ...
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as effective as I had hoped, but adequate for what it is. It remains difficult to finagle my granddaughter's dishes into the machine, without wasting space, soap and water. Still, when we're finally ready to wash a load, it cleans the dishes well. As directed by the accompanying instructions, it is necessary to clean the dishes of pieces of food prior to insertion into the dishwasher, as there is no water heater or debris grinder in it. So far, it has neither leaked nor balked, so we remain sanguine as to its continued adequate performance.
customer_reviews.author: ladlai

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Must use the right detergent and water temperature for spotless dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Al Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little machine
customer_reviews.text: My daughter received this for Christmas, and it is fantastic. Cannot believe how well made it is. Great for a small apartment or loft, or even at a wet bar. It does a great job. You must have HOT water, and let dishes air or towel dry.
customer_reviews.author: Boxes Chick

customer_reviews.title: The little miracle that holds more dishes than you think!
customer_reviews.text: I really can't say enough about this little miracle, it doesn't use much water, it's quiet as far as dishwashers go and it works great. It was very easy to hook up. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Nate Sturgill

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Well rather my wife loves it. My daughter and her husband bought a house and the previous owners left a portable dishwasher behind. My wife saw it and asked for one for Christmas. Those were over twice the price of this one but as far as I can tell are the same with the addition of a cart and wheels. We have a perfect spot right next to the kitchen sink and that where I installed it for her. Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: J. B. Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Junk! Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Very dissapointed in this product. I have had it for a little over a year and it is done! Leaks very bad from underneath it. Called the service number through Amazon and was told that the pump that removes the water from the machine was shot and that it would probably cost me what I paid for it to be replaced . I only used this dishwasher once a week as I live alone. Do not buy it!
customer_reviews.author: William L. Rzodkiewicz

customer_reviews.title: The product itself is absolutely amazing!
customer_reviews.text: But........... I think before they sent my dishwasher they tested it to be sure it worked and did not fully drain the water from the inside.... 😕 So the card board on the inside got wet and had a distinct smell or standing water.... not to mention the condensation on the inside of the door... I sanitized it ran an empty load with detergent and the smell was gone in no time... oooh it's a lot bigger than I expected it to be! Quick an easy to put together and attach to the sink!
customer_reviews.author: sammy

customer_reviews.title: and this dishwasher is the perfect size. She said she loves it
customer_reviews.text: It was for my wife. We do not have a lot of kitchen space, and this dishwasher is the perfect size. She said she loves it, and recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan M.

customer_reviews.title: Love this dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this dishwasher for over a month and I love it. The hose connection is easy to use and the fitting that came with the dishwasher replaced my faucet aerator perfectly. There are no leaks anywhere. The dishes come out sparkling clean with no water spots. One note of caution-- if you have a faucet without a screw in aerator the hose connector won't fit. You either have to change your faucet or don't buy this dishwasher. The packaging weighs as much as this product and it would be a nightmare to return.
customer_reviews.author: Jayessare

customer_reviews.title: After a great deal of research and trials
customer_reviews.text: Please be aware that there could be an issue connecting the water inlet and hose. After a great deal of research and trials, we were finally able to fix that issue. It cleans the dishes well but is annoying to hear the water draining sound in the night while it is on.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: It is a time saver except when it doesn't release ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a time saver except when it doesn't release the dishwashing pellet! I have had 5 CYCLES IN A ROW where the pellet did not release! At this point I am manually pausing the dishwasher, opening it and releasing the pellet to ensure the dishes get washed.
customer_reviews.author: Leila N

customer_reviews.title: Works Great In Our Office - Amazing
customer_reviews.text: We have been using one of these for more than 3 years and it has worked flawlessly! It is in our store and used to take care of lunch and snack dishes for 5 hungry people. It is used 3 to 4 times per week and works great. Easy to use and and maintain. We love this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Cotten

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great product.
customer_reviews.text: The first one was receive dented and was returned. The Second one has worked flawlessly. Washed every dish glass vase, took 3 days but they're all done. Hooked up to faucet with everything that was provided.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice little dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a nice little dishwasher. Have had it for six months with no problems. Permanently installed in cabinet to hide it away. Perfect for the two of us.
customer_reviews.author: auggie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Runs like a dream!! Gets dishes very clean! Exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: JJB

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This was the best investment I've made in a long time. I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: justin

customer_reviews.title: Great dishwasher for baby bottles and other stuff
customer_reviews.text: It has been more than a month since we bought this dishwasher. We use it only for our baby's utensils, bottles and related. It works great! It saves hours of washing bottles everyday and they are maybe cleaner because the dishwasher can handle super hot water. I do not know yet whether it saves or uses more water but my guess is that we are also winning on that front. I will update once the water bill comes in.
customer_reviews.author: Julian.Ram

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: life saver when you are the kind of person who hates doing dishes
customer_reviews.author: Lillian Coston

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Works great... Doesn't dry amazingly but open the door and you're good.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Good investment
customer_reviews.text: Got the dishwasher today. It was an easy set up and did fit the counter top. Did the first load and the dishes turned out great. A little short for the dinner plates.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette

customer_reviews.title: This was the best decision and product I've purchased this year and I ...
customer_reviews.text: This was the best decision and product I've purchased this year and I buy alot:). It works perfectly and it matches my white appliance kitchen. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Self Help Guru

customer_reviews.title: Good compact dishwasher at a decent price
customer_reviews.text: I have had this dishwasher for about 2 years now and am very happy with it. It has a decent amount of room for dishes for 1-2 people and does a good job of cleaning. I would recommend washing for at least 1 hour and 25 minutes. It is rather heavy so 2 people lifting it out of the box is advisable.
customer_reviews.author: Mark V. Laseen

customer_reviews.title: Easy for the elderly
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little dishwasher. I bought it for my mother when she had to move into an efficiency apartment at my house. She loves it. She uses it every day. The size is perfect for her uses. It is easy for her to hook up and she keeps it in a rolling cart so it can be moved out of the way when not in use. It does take a little longer to run than a standard dishwasher but planning is the key. We would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: not sure all the time spent researching the best portable dishwasher was helpful
customer_reviews.text: The dishwasher arrived with the interior wet. The blue protective coating had been removed from the interior. It worked well for 5 dish washings. Started leaking under the dishwasher. Not where the out and intake hoses were. I am returning this, not sure all the time spent researching the best portable dishwasher was helpful.
customer_reviews.author: ws

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Good dishwasher and holds a good bit of dishes. Only downside is the hoses. They retain water and it is difficult to purge them after disconnecting from the sink. Should have come with some sort of holder.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this little machine. It works well and gets my dishes clean.
customer_reviews.author: Donna A Leavell

customer_reviews.title: Great product and perfect for my countertop.
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this dishwasher, I've been using it everyday for the past 2 years, it gets my dishes clean with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: David R.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Had to return. Wouldn't pump water out. Don't order this.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Bruehl

customer_reviews.title: My little powerhouse Magic Chef MCSD6W3 Dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: This little dream machine works just like a full size dishwasher! Everything comes out sparkling clean! No drying issues at a all. If you don’t have the space for a full size dishwasher the Magic Chef MCSD6W3 6 place setting dishwasher is the one to get without any regrets. I would definitely purchase this product again!
customer_reviews.author: MLC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: best and installed under cabinet and hard lined in to the waster system
customer_reviews.author: somungho

customer_reviews.title: Beware of leaking..
customer_reviews.text: bought it on September 22nd. it has already started leaking. don't even know what to do or where to start! super expensive paper weight. there is no way to return this thing. super disappointing but a great idea.
customer_reviews.author: Jon B

customer_reviews.title: Great Dishwasher for Renters!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy for our apartment! Easy to install and can wash all of our dishes and some smaller pots and pans. Also no leak issues like some other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Noah G.

customer_reviews.title: Not having a washing machine in my apartment sucked. 3 years of scrubbing dishes and getting in ...
customer_reviews.text: Not having a washing machine in my apartment sucked. 3 years of scrubbing dishes and getting in fights with my significant other over whose turn it was to do the dishes. NO MORE!!! This was easily the best purchase I've made in the past 5 years, it's paid dividends in my health and well being. Don't be scared away at an expensive table top dishwasher, this one is ABSOLUTELY worth it. It works fantastically, fits all my dishes, and has gotten everything 100% shiny clean every time. Amazon should really increase the amount of stars you can give, because this one deserves 10 out of 5.
customer_reviews.author: C Foster

customer_reviews.title: A good dish washer
customer_reviews.text: The dish washer is very good at cleaning glass ware, plates, and silver ware. I particularly like the water hose release valve. I release the pressure before removing the hose from the faucet. No more spray in my face. The only caveat that I have noticed is limited room for pots and pans. That limitation is intrinsic to the counter top design.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Cheap adapter broke first day.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could say that this product works well or bad, but unfortunately it has been completely unusable due to the faucet adapter being cheap and damaged upon delivery. I attached the faucet adapter to my sink and when I turned the water on, the adapter literally exploded off my faucet and stripped itself off. My faucet is fine and I can re-attach the original areoator but the adapter that came with the product is completely fubar. Made out of cheap metal I assume, Its sad that for 300+ dollars, I have to spend even more money now to buy a new adapter (which finding the right adapter is already proving to be its own headache).
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: The Magic Chef is much better made and is working well
customer_reviews.text: I bought a cheaper countertop DW and had to send it back after it broke... The Magic Chef is much better made and is working well.
customer_reviews.author: robert vance watt

customer_reviews.title: VERY Happy!
customer_reviews.text: It was a snap to set up! I am AMAZED at how well it cleans my dishes, even stuck on grim. I cannot praise this enough!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Abby ML

customer_reviews.title: The output hose connection for the dirty water should have a washer to help prevent leaking
customer_reviews.text: The output hose connection for the dirty water should have a washer to help prevent leaking. Our machine works well except for that we've had it for less than a week and have had to clean up some major leaking from the back of the machine which floods the counter. it seems to clean the dishes fairly well though.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne L Biswokarma

customer_reviews.title: LED light looks like it's about to quit working other than that it works well.
customer_reviews.text: Been working great until today I noticed the LED light that displays the time is about to go out. It's really dim.
customer_reviews.author: Trent

customer_reviews.title: Great little machine
customer_reviews.text: We needed this badly. If you're considering this as your first dishwasher for a small apartment, do it. Gone are the days when looking at my overflowing sink brought me to a crippling state of anxiety. After about a month, the glasses started coming out stained, but a quick vinegar cycle seemed to fix everything. Great little machine, so happy it hooks up to my sink.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Carey

customer_reviews.title: This sits on my counter and fits under my cabinets great. I does a great job cleaning the dishes ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a small kitchen with no room for either a built-in or large portable dishwasher. This sits on my counter and fits under my cabinets great. I does a great job cleaning the dishes and is extremely quiet. It comes with the hoses to connect to the sink and is very easy to setup. It does hold 6 place settings as well as silverware which is perfect for my small household.
customer_reviews.author: Myra N

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best I got. Only thing is the dinner dishes do not fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I just took out my new dish washer and there ...
customer_reviews.text: I just took out my new dish washer and there is a dent in the left side. I hope it works
customer_reviews.author: rosemary a cordova

product_meta.title: Magic Chef MCSCD6W3 6 Place Setting Countertop Dishwasher, White
product_meta.description: Magic Chef's 6-Place Countertop Dishwasher gives you the convenience of a large dishwasher without taking up all the space. Use the program knob to choose from 5 wash-cycle options. Place cutlery in a separate basket and cups in their own rack. The dishwasher includes an efficient drying system, an antiflood mechanism, and an automatic detergent and rinse dispenser. A quick setup kit is also included.
feature_bullets: Easy-to-use Electronic Controls With Digital Display
Organized Interior Arrangement Includes Cutlery Basket & Cup Rack
Hygienic Residual Drying System Avoids Using Air Outside The Dishwasher

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars94 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
